abstract: Facebook tests a “buy” button. The Consumer Product Safety Commission orders a recall of Buckyballs. And some theories on why workers are disappearing from the job market.

lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: When Is the Best Time to Send a Marketing Email?
